summary: Eroleth is an assassin npc that is sexy and deadly at the same time,her combat is the assassin combat style,and she is fully dressable.
descriptionHtml:
................................PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT THANX................................................. 

Eroleth is an assassin npc that is sexy and deadly at the same time,her combat is the assassin combat style,and she is fully dressable. 

Eroleth 1.1 fix__

The head skin now matches body

changed her jaw and nose a lil bit for a more feminize look 


clothing_winch Barmaid outfit{default}

Default sleep outfit {Nocturnal}

spouse voice is {condescending}

Located in Riften at the BeenBarb

Mod to use!!..A Must...

ApachiiSkyHair Retexture
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357&navtag=file/images.php?id=10357&tab=3

Mods to use if u wish...

Better Females by Bella
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Dancing Crane Katana
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10084

Nightshade Armor DIMONIZED UNP
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12070

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

the makeup used on her is a texture replacer my girlfriend and i are working on still called 
\"The Gothic woman of Skyrim\" we will release it as soon as its done,she is very picky on looks lol

PS..if any modders out the wish to use her for a quest.i dont mind at all ,just credit me for her
author: Arnomus
